game.name: Police Chief Simulator: Prologue - Early Days
game.genres: 액션, 캐주얼, 인디, 시뮬레이션, 전략, 무료 플레이
game.shortDescription: Free introduction to the full Police Chief Simulator game takes you to Winston Springs Police Station! Handle incoming reports, renovate and expand the station, solve cases, and fight crime!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Free introduction to the full Police Chief Simulator game takes you to Winston Springs Police Station! Handle incoming reports, renovate and expand the station, solve cases, and fight crime!
